afterwards, we went down the CC to play. it was totally FUNNNNNN. iggy sprained his ankle laughing at maria's CRIPPLE-ness. hoho, (: that maria la, play eventhough she's like already half crippled. (: heeeeeeeee.

anyways, i think the librarian's mad at us. making too much noise. gotta go. TATA.

WHEN YOURE GONE-AVRIL LAVIGNE.

i always needed time on my own,
i never thought i'd need you there when i cry.
and the days feel like years when im alone
and the bed where you lie
is made up on your side

when you walk away
i count the steps that you take
do you see how much i need you right now?

when youre gone 
the pieces of my heart are missing you
when youre gone
the face i came to know is missing too
when youre gone
the words i need to hear to always get me through the day
and make it okay
i miss you

i never felt this way before
everything that i do
reminds me of you
and the clothes you left
they lie on the floor
and they smell just like you
i love the things that you do.

when you walk away
i count the steps that you take
do you see how much i need you right now?

when youre gone 
the pieces of my heart are missing you
when youre gone
the face i came to know is missing too
when youre gone
the words i need to hear to always get me through the day
and make it okay
i miss you

we were made for each other
out here forever
i know we were
yeah yeah

all i ever wanted was for you to know
everything i do i give my heart and soul
i cant hardly breathe i need to feel you here with me

when youre gone 
the pieces of my heart are missing you
when youre gone
the face i came to know is missing too
when youre gone
the words i need to hear to always get me through the day
and make it okay
i miss you

JUST AFTER POA LESSON...

this is not a fairytale by the way. this woman from TCS like just appeared in our class with Mr SURIN. i thought it was about the Maria's ankle thingy. it wasnt.

it was this talen-scout- ER. she was like looking for talent. like those people who can act and dance and all that.
DAMN. thought i was dreaming. OH MY GOSHY-NESS!  she spotted me, komey and sammy. she wanted me to act, sam be an AH LIAN and komey be a host. next thing, we've got her namecard and she like asked us to e-mail our close-shot &full body pic. YEAYYYYY!

ps: mr rafi is going to act toos. handsome much. (:

MAYBE- KELLY CLARKSON.


im strong, but i break,
im stubborn &make plenty of mistakes.
yeah, im hard and life with me is never easy
to figure out, to love, im jaded but im also lonely
all you have to do is hold me
and you'll know, and you'll see how sweet it can be
if youll trust me, love me, let me, maybe, maybe

someday when we're at the same place.
when we're on the same road.
when its okay to hold my hand without feeling lost
without all excuses
when its all because
you love me, you let me, you need me, then maybe, maybe

im confusing as hell
yeahh,im north and im south
and i'll probably never have it figured out
but what i know is i wasnt meant to walk this world alone without you
and i promise i'll try
yeah, im going to try to give you every part of me
every single detail of me you missed with your eyes
http://sameoldlyrics.livejournal.com/1031.html

what matters mostb to you?
your feelings? your pride? or your heart?
what are your priorities?
do they mean a thing?
im asking cos i want to know.
i thought you were telling the truth.
i thought you were pouring you heart.
i thought you finally opened up.
but i guess youre good at what youre doing.
LYING. PRETENDING. HURTING.
damn, youre getting pretty low.
youre lettine others think what they shouldnt.
oh whatever! i've lost the game.


dear you. youre nice.
but stop playing your games.
